class.name: BasestationGuiPlugin
class.description: Main gui for SubT human interface

class.name: CalibrationPlugin
class.description: Calibrate robot positions and load transformed frames to DARPA.

qtgui.label: Robot Calibration
qtgui.statustip: Calibrate robot positions and load transformed frames to DARPA.

class.name: InfoPlugin
class.description: Plugin to display status info from darpa

qtgui.label: InfoPlugin
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to display info from darpa.

class.name: ArtifactSubmissionPlugin
class.description: Plugin to display information about artifact submissions

qtgui.label: ArtifactSubmissionPlugin
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to display information about artifact submissions

class.name: RobotStatusPlugin
class.description: Plugin to display info about robot status (battery, mobility, etc.)

qtgui.label: RobotStatusPlugin
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to display info about robot status (battery, mobility, etc.)

class.name: RobotCommandPlugin
class.description: Plugin to include command buttons for the robot (e-stop, etc.)

qtgui.label: RobotCommandPlugin
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to include command buttons for the robot (e-stop, etc.)

class.name: ArtifactQueuePlugin
class.description: Plugin to display the artifact queue

qtgui.label: ArtifactQueuePlugin
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to display the artifact queue

class.name: ArtifactManipulationPlugin
class.description: Plugin to manipulation artifact properties (position, category, submission to DARPA, etc.)

qtgui.label: ArtifactManipulationPlugin
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to manipulation artifact properties (position, category, submission to DARPA, etc.)

class.name: ArtifactImageVisualizerPlugin
class.description: Plugin to visualize artifact rgb images
